data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Nuristan who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nuristan, Afghanistan

data.prayer: the state of Nuristan has (about) 26 people who know Jesus, 5 people who know about him culturally, and 163,869 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 70 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Nuristan, Afghanistan.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nuristan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Nuristan, Afghanistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pashayi, Northwest people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Nuristan to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, guide the 26 believers in the state of Nuristan into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 26 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

location.name: Nuristan
location.people_groups_list: Changgar, Parachi, Afshari, Parya, Nuristani, Prasuni
